fieldDescription: Set to true to cancel the record level limit. You have to reach the [max player level] to unlock the savepoint recording by default.
Set to true to cancel the record times limit, which means you could record the savepoints [whenever you want] if you meet the record condition.
Set to true to disable/hide the left top [specialist widget].

fieldName: Hide Rule Message At the start of Battle
fieldDescription: Set to true to disable/hide the left top rule messages shown [at the start of the battle].
